title: SCP01 - Core Contributor Compensation Plan
body:
**Summary**

Seed Club’s first proposal seeks to onboard and compensate a team of core contributors to deliver on the DAO’s strategy and objectives.

**Motivation**

The proposal aims to onboard full-time contributors to Seed Club to execute on projects designed to drive value to the DAO and grow its treasury. By compensating a team of core contributors, the DAO strives to accelerate Seed Club’s execution of social token related projects and initiatives.

Three roles have been defined

Instigator: Responsible for DAO vision, business development, media presence and partnerships. (This role was voted in previously.)

Facilitator: Responsible for DAO operations, collaborator communication, governance implementation, and studio client management.

Educator: Responsible for community management, educational content development, and accelerator programming.

**Specification**

This proposal seeks to accomplish three primary goals:

1. Reward core contributors with $CLUB for prior work and participation in the DAO.
2. Outline a USDC monthly payment schedule for full-time DAO contributors.
3. Outline a $CLUB monthly token allocation for full-time DAO contributors.

Below are the key terms of the proposal:

Retroactive Token Distribution

Instigator: N/A
Facilitator: 10,000 $CLUB
Educator: 10,000 $CLUB

Monthly USDC Compensation:

Instigator: $10,000
Facilitator: $8,000
Educator: $8,000

$CLUB Compensation:

Instigator: N/A (passed via previous proposal)
Facilitator: 1% of $CLUB Supply vested over 4 years.
Educator: 1% of $CLUB Supply vested over 4 years.

$CLUB compensation will not be subject to a cliff. USDC and $CLUB compensation is subject to change at the voting discretion of the DAO. Compensation will be effective July 1st, 2021.

**Vote**

Yes - Agree to accept compensation package for core contributors 
No - Refusal to accept compensation package for core contributors
author: 0x42DFAf5266Ad40AB4533F9806F5CC1DF4C1eB363
